definition: Panshi county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
solid as a boulder (idiom); absolutely secure/rock-firm and unyielding
Panshi county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
as solid as rock (idiom); as sure as houses

sentences.english: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me?
sentences.chinese: 我要对神我的磐石说，你为何忘记我呢。

sentences.english: That they were graven with an iron pen and lead in the rock for ever!
sentences.chinese: 用铁笔镌刻，用铅灌在磐石上，直存到永远。

sentences.english: He's been such a stable guy in the league, like a rock.
sentences.chinese: 在联盟里，他非常稳定，坚如磐石。

sentences.english: I am steady as a rock-fixed as the Polar Star.
sentences.chinese: 我坚定得象磐石，稳定得象北极星。

sentences.english: Pray for Naxi believers to stand on God our Rock.
sentences.chinese: 愿纳西族基督徒站稳在我们的上帝磐石上。

sentences.english: My body had withered away to a mere 65 pounds but my faith and will were rock solid.
sentences.chinese: 我的体重下降到只有65磅，但我的信念却坚如磐石。

sentences.english: These are the people who will be there for you no matter what, they are your rocks, your pillars.
sentences.chinese: 这些人什么时候都会在那儿，他们是你的磐石和支柱。

sentences.english: What turns a stone-hard woman into the blubbering mess I see before me?
sentences.chinese: 是什么把眼前这个坚如磐石的女人哭成了泪人？

sentences.english: He’s likely to assume that you’ll be rock-solid on the job too.
sentences.chinese: 他会认为在工作中你也将稳如磐石。

sentences.english: Clove learned that case is not trust, disguised as men returned to the town of rock.
sentences.chinese: 丁香得知情况却不放心，女扮男装回到了磐石镇。

sentences.english: But Ireland and Spain had what seemed to be rock-solid fiscal positions (see charts).
sentences.chinese: 但爱尔兰和西班牙的财政状况看上去坚如磐石。

sentences.english: The conies are but a feeble folk, yet make they their houses in the rocks;
sentences.chinese: 沙番是软弱之类，却在磐石中造房。

sentences.english: Health and the sea Ningbi cold, Shek Pik cut straight into the sea, rock Provisional Cliff Yan lying.
sentences.chinese: 大海凝碧生寒，石壁直削入海，磐石临崖偃卧。

sentences.english: 16 he brought streams out of a rocky crag and made water flow down like rivers.
sentences.chinese: 他使水从磐石涌出，叫水如江河下流。

sentences.english: When Moses struck the rock, it gave life-giving water.
sentences.chinese: 被摩西敲打的磐石，果然流出活水。

sentences.english: The solidarity among China's various nationalities is as firm as a rock.
sentences.chinese: 中国各族人民之间的团结坚如磐石。

definition: solid as a boulder (idiom); absolutely secure/rock-firm and unyielding
secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack
Tieshan district of Huangshi city 黃石市|黄石市[Huang2 shi2 shi4], Hubei

Yingpan, common place name ("army camp")/place near Jintian village 金田村[Jin1 tian2 cun1] in Guangxi where the Taiping Tianguo rebels took their oaths in 1851/place in Xinfeng county 新豐縣|新丰县[Xin1 feng1 Xian4] traditional camping place of brigands/Yingpan township, place name/Yingpan in Shangluo prefecture, Shaanxi/Yingpan township in Yunnan/(many others)
as secure as Mount Taishan/as solid as a rock
sudden clap of thunder/fig. surprising turn of events
to cache/to hide supplies (from the enemy)
